column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I went to the corner market with my list of things I needed to buy .
#id=2
#text=I grabbed a shopping cart and wheeled it up and down the aisles .
#id=3
#text=I started at aisle one and went through each one in order to make sure that I got everything I needed .
#id=4
#text=Fruit and vegetables were placed in flimsy plastic bags that the market provided for me .
#id=5
#text=I got eggs and placed them in the cart 's basket so they would n't get broken .
#id=6
#text=All other items were tossed in the cart .
#id=7
#text=After I got everything on my list , I rolled the cart to the cashier .
#id=8
#text=He scanned all my products and gave me a final , total price .
#id=9
#text=A grocery bagger put all of my items in paper bags .
#text=I paid the cashier in cash and he gave me change .
#text=I thanked him , I thanked the bagger , and then I left with my groceries .
